pullRequest.title: EVMTool improvements
pullRequest.bodyText:
Support clique genesis (needs a nodekey)
Write genesis allocations to world state
Report total gas (EVM operations + intrinsic cost of TX)

Signed-off-by: Danno Ferrin danno.ferrin@gmail.com

commit.message:
EVMTool improvements

* Support clique genesis (needs a nodekey)
* Write genesis allocations to world state
* Report total gas (EVM operations + intrinsic cost of TX)

Signed-off-by: Danno Ferrin <danno.ferrin@gmail.com>

Spotless

Add log4j for errors.

Signed-off-by: Danno Ferrin <danno.ferrin@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText: In my opinion I think it is possible to add private final here
Why don't we use the logger present in the class to log this? LogManager.getLogger()
